episode.title: Rufo v. Inmates of Suffolk County Jail

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinion of the Court in No. 90-954, Rufo against the Inmates of Suffolk County Jail and a companion case will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: For the reasons stated in an opinion on file with the Clerk, the judgment of the Court of Appeals for the First Circuit in these cases is vacated and remanded for further proceedings.
Justice Stevens has filed a dissenting opinion that Justice Blackmun has joined.
Justice Thomas took no part in the consideration and decision of the case.
